mapper.select: SELECT CC.COMMON_NM ITEM_GN, CC2.COMMON_NM ITEM_CN, MT.MATERIAL_CD ITEM_CD, MT.MATERIAL_NM ITEM_NM, CC3.COMMON_NM ITEM_UN, WH.WAREHOUSE_CD, WH.WAREHOUSE_NM FROM MATERIAL MT LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'PRDTYPE' AND CC.COMMON_CC = MT.MATERIAL_GC LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = MT.MATERIAL_GC AND CC2.COMMON_CC = MT.MATERIAL_CC LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC3 ON CC3.COMMON_GC = 'UNIT' AND CC3.COMMON_CC = MT.MATERIAL_UN LEFT OUTER JOIN WAREHOUSE WH ON WH.WAREHOUSE_CD = MT.MATERIAL_WH WHERE MT.MATERIAL_GC = #{material_gc} AND MT.MATERIAL_CC = #{material_cc} AND MT.MATERIAL_CD LIKE '%${filter.item_cd}%' AND MT.MATERIAL_NM LIKE '%${filter.item_nm}%'

SELECT CC.COMMON_NM ITEM_GN, CC2.COMMON_NM ITEM_CN, PD.PRODUCT_CD ITEM_CD, PD.PRODUCT_NM ITEM_NM, PD.PRODUCT_SZ ITEM_SZ, PD.PRODUCT_CR COLOR, CC3.COMMON_NM COLOR_NM, CC4.COMMON_NM ITEM_UN, WH.WAREHOUSE_CD, WH.WAREHOUSE_NM FROM PRODUCT PD LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'PRDTYPE' AND CC.COMMON_CC = PD.PRODUCT_GC LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = PD.PRODUCT_GC AND CC2.COMMON_CC = PD.PRODUCT_CC LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC3 ON CC3.COMMON_GC = 'COLOR' AND CC3.COMMON_CC = PD.PRODUCT_CR LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC4 ON CC4.COMMON_GC = 'UNIT' AND CC4.COMMON_CC = PD.PRODUCT_UN LEFT OUTER JOIN WAREHOUSE WH ON WH.WAREHOUSE_CD = PD.PRODUCT_WH WHERE PD.PRODUCT_GC = #{product_gc} AND PD.PRODUCT_CC = #{product_cc} AND PD.PRODUCT_CD LIKE '%${filter.item_cd}%' AND PD.PRODUCT_NM LIKE '%${filter.item_nm}%' AND PD.PRODUCT_SZ = #{filter.item_sz} AND PD.PRODUCT_CR = #{filter.item_cr}

SELECT PD.PRODUCT_GC ITEM_GC, CC2.COMMON_NM ITEM_GN, PD.PRODUCT_CC ITEM_CC, CC3.COMMON_NM ITEM_CN, PD.PRODUCT_NM AS ITEM_NM, WH.WAREHOUSE_NM, WA.WAREAREA_NM, CC.COMMON_NM AS COLOR_NM, PD.PRODUCT_UN AS ITEM_UN, ST.WAREHOUSE_CD, ST.WAREAREA_CD, ST.STOCK_AQ, ST.STOCK_TP, SUBSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, 1, INSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, '-') - 1) AS ITEM_CD, SUBSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, INSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, '-', -1) + 1) AS COLOR, SUBSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, INSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, '-') + 1, 3) AS "SIZE" FROM STOCK ST LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT PD ON PD.PRODUCT_CD = SUBSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, 1, INSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, '-') - 1) AND PD.PRODUCT_CR = SUBSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, INSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, '-', -1) + 1) AND PD.PRODUCT_SZ = SUBSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, INSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, '-') + 1, 3) LEFT OUTER JOIN WAREHOUSE WH ON WH.WAREHOUSE_CD = ST.WAREHOUSE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN WAREAREA WA ON WA.WAREAREA_CD = ST.WAREAREA_CD AND WA.WAREHOUSE_CD = ST.WAREHOUSE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'COLOR' AND CC.COMMON_CC = SUBSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, INSTR(ST.ITEM_CD, '-', -1) + 1) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = 'PRDTYPE' AND CC2.COMMON_CC = PD.PRODUCT_GC LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC3 ON CC3.COMMON_GC = PD.PRODUCT_GC AND CC3.COMMON_CC = PD.PRODUCT_CC WHERE ST.STOCK_TP = 'Y' AND ST.WAREHOUSE_CD = #{filter.warehouse_cd} AND ST.WAREAREA_CD = #{filter.warearea_cd} AND PD.PRODUCT_GC = #{filter.item_gc} AND PD.PRODUCT_CC = #{filter.item_cc} AND PD.PRODUCT_NM LIKE '%${filter.item_nm}%' UNION ALL SELECT ST.ITEM_GC, ST.ITEM_GN, ST.ITEM_CC, ST.ITEM_CN, ST.ITEM_NM, ST.WAREHOUSE_NM, ST.WAREAREA_NM, NULL, ST.ITEM_UN, ST.WAREHOUSE_CD, ST.WAREAREA_CD, ST.STOCK_AQ, ST.STOCK_TP, ST.ITEM_CD, NULL, NULL FROM ( SELECT MR.MATERIAL_GC ITEM_GC, CC.COMMON_NM ITEM_GN, MR.MATERIAL_CC ITEM_CC, CC2.COMMON_NM ITEM_CN, MR.MATERIAL_NM AS ITEM_NM, WH.WAREHOUSE_NM, WA.WAREAREA_NM, MR.MATERIAL_UN ITEM_UN, ST.ITEM_CD, ST.WAREHOUSE_CD, ST.WAREAREA_CD, ST.STOCK_TP, ST.STOCK_AQ FROM STOCK ST LEFT OUTER JOIN MATERIAL MR ON MR.MATERIAL_CD = ST.ITEM_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN WAREHOUSE WH ON WH.WAREHOUSE_CD = ST.WAREHOUSE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN WAREAREA WA ON WA.WAREAREA_CD = ST.WAREAREA_CD AND WA.WAREHOUSE_CD = ST.WAREHOUSE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'PRDTYPE' AND CC.COMMON_CC = MR.MATERIAL_GC LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = MR.MATERIAL_GC AND CC2.COMMON_CC = MR.MATERIAL_CC WHERE ST.STOCK_TP = 'N' AND ST.WAREHOUSE_CD = #{filter.warehouse_cd} AND ST.WAREAREA_CD = #{filter.warearea_cd} AND MR.MATERIAL_GC = #{filter.item_gc} AND MR.MATERIAL_CC = #{filter.item_cc} AND MR.MATERIAL_NM LIKE '%${filter.item_nm}%' ) ST ORDER BY WAREHOUSE_CD, WAREAREA_CD
